DOC.brief_summary: More recent study show HBV-infected population great risk development hepatocellular carcinoma . Nevertheless , still significant number people chronically infect HBV develop complication . Hence , exist biological marker could indicator disease-inducing carcinogenic potential virus .
DOC.brief_title: The Development Diagnostic Biomarker Panels Hepatitis Liver Cancer
